text: Bembibre is a municipality in the province of León (Spain). == Language == Spanish Language is the main language spoke in this municipality, in rural zones the Leonese Language might be spoken as well. ==Related pages== * Leonese Language * León (Llión) * Kingdom of León * Province of Llión Category:Municipalities in the Kingdom of León Category:Municipalities in Castile and León Category:Settlements in León
title: Bembibre
